role.name: /OC1A
role.desc: Output compare matchA output(inverted): The pin can serve as an external output for the Timer/Counter1 output com-pareA. The pin has to be configured as an output to serve this function. The OC1A pin is also the output pin for the PWM mode timer function.

role.name: SDA
role.desc: 2-wire Serial Bus Data: When the TWEN bit in TWCR is set (one) to enable the 2-wire Serial Interface, pin is disconnected from the port and becomes the Serial Data I/O pin for the 2-wire Serial Interface. In this mode, there is a spike filter on the pin to capture spikes shorter than 50 ns on the input signal, and the pin is driven by an open collector driver with slew rate limitation.

role.name: MOSI
role.desc: Data input pin for memory downloading or SPI.

role.name: OC1A
role.desc: Output compare matchA output: The pin can serve as an external output for the Timer/Counter1 output com-pareA. The pin has to be configured as an output to serve this function. The OC1A pin is also the output pin for the PWM mode timer function.

role.name: MISO
role.desc: Data output pin for memory uploading or SPI.

role.name: /OC1B
role.desc: Output compare matchB output (inverted). The pin can serve as an external output for the Timer/Counter1 output compareB. The pin has to be configured as an output to serve this function. The OC1B pin is also the output pin for the PWM mode timer function.

role.name: SCL
role.desc: 2-wire Serial Interface Clock: When the TWEN bit in TWCR is set (one) to enable the 2-wire Serial Interface, pin is disconnected from the port and becomes the Serial Clock I/O pin for the 2-wire Serial Interface. In this mode, there is a spike filter on the pin to capture spikes shorter than 50 ns on the input signal.

role.name: SCK
role.desc: Clock input pin for memory up/downloading or SPI.

role.name: OC1B
role.desc: Output compare matchB output. The pin can serve as an external output for the Timer/Counter1 output compareB. The OC1B pin is also the output pin for the PWM mode timer function.

role.name: XTAL1
role.desc: Pin for connecting external clock source (crystal, resonator..) for MCU (input)

role.name: /OC1D
role.desc: /OC1D - Output compare matchD output (inverted). The pin can serve as an external output for the Timer/Counter1 output compareD. The pin has to be configured as an output to serve this function. The OC1D pin is also the output pin for the PWM mode timer function.

role.name: XTAL2
role.desc: Pin for connecting external clock source (crystal, resonator..) for MCU (output)

role.name: OC1D
role.desc: Output compare matchD output. The pin can serve as an external output for the Timer/Counter1 output compareD. The pin has to be configured as an output to serve this function. The OC1D pin is also the output pin for the PWM mode timer function.

role.name: INT0
role.desc: External Interrupt source 0 to the MCU.

role.name: OC1D
role.desc: Output compare matchD output. The pin can serve as an external output for the Timer/Counter1 output compareD. The pin has to be configured as an output to serve this function. The OC1D pin is also the output pin for the PWM mode timer function.

role.name: /RESET
role.desc: Reset pin for MCU, active at low.

role.name: AIN1
role.desc: AIN1, Analog Comparator Negative Input. When configured as an input and with the internal MOS pull-up resistor switched off, this pin also serves as the negative input of the on-chip Analog Comparator.

role.name: AIN0
role.desc: Analog Comparator Positive Input. When configured as an input and with the internal MOS pull-up resistor switched off, this pin also serves as the positive input of the on-chip Analog Comparator.

role.name: AIN2
role.desc: Analog Comparator Negative/Positive Input. When configured as an input and with the internal MOS pull-up resistor switched off, this pin also serves as the negative input of the on-chip Analog Comparator.

role.name: SCL_ALT
role.desc: 2-wire Serial Interface Clock: When the TWEN bit in TWCR is set (one) to enable the 2-wire Serial Interface, pin is disconnected from the port and becomes the Serial Clock I/O pin for the 2-wire Serial Interface. In this mode, there is a spike filter on the pin to capture spikes shorter than 50 ns on the input signal.

role.name: USCK_ALT
role.desc: 3-wire mode Universal serial interface clock. (Alternative location)

role.name: INT1
role.desc: External Interrupt source 1 to the MCU.

role.name: DO_ALT
role.desc: Data Output - Universal serial interface. (Alternative location)

role.name: SDA_ALT
role.desc: 2-wire Serial Bus Data: When the TWEN bit in TWCR is set (one) to enable the 2-wire Serial Interface, pin is disconnected from the port and becomes the Serial Data I/O pin for the 2-wire Serial Interface. In this mode, there is a spike filter on the pin to capture spikes shorter than 50 ns on the input signal, and the pin is driven by an open collector driver with slew rate limitation.

role.name: DI_ALT
role.desc: Data Input - Universal serial interface. (Alternative location)
